page.title: 04COUSAR'S FARMS
page.content: LYNN,BENTS AND DOLLY FARMS ARE OWNED BY MR JAMES.G.COUSAR.THE FARMS ARE ALL RUN TOGETHER AS A DAIRY.THE TOTAL ACREAGE OF ALL THREE FARMS IS 400 ACRES.100 ACRES ARE CUT FOR SILAGE.25 ACRES ARE CUT FOR HAY,THERE IS 18 ACRES OF WINTER BARLEY AND 13 ACRES OF SPRING BARLEY.THE MILKING UNIT IS AT LYNN FARM,THERE IS 120 MILKING COWS AND 245 YOUNG CATTLE.EACH YEAR THERE ARE 50 BULLOCKS AROUND 18 MONTHS OLD.THEY ARE SOLD AS STORES AT STIRLING LIVESTOCK MARTS.THERE IS ALSO 50 HEIFERS WHICH WILL EITHER REPLACE OLDER COWS IN THE HERD OR WILL BE SOLD AS DAIRY HEIFERS AT STIRLING.THERE IS ALSO 145 CALVES UNDER 1 YEAR OLD.THE HEIFERS WILL BE REARED UNTIL THEY ARE AT LEAST 3 YEARS OLD.ALL CATTLE ARE DUAL PURPOSE BLACK AND WHITE FRESIANS.
